eventDeatureData.Heading: Interview Preparation Guide for Product Based Companies
eventDeatureData.paragraph1: The world’s top product-based companies are looking for the cream of the crop, and you could be their next hire! But before you ace those interviews, make sure you have a solid foundation in programming fundamentals and a killer prep strategy. That's where we come in!
eventDeatureData.paragraph1_1: Join us on 7th January at 5 pm for a FREE Masterclass with Ayush (SDE, Ex JP Morgan & Ex Oracle) on ‘Interview Preparation Guide for Product-based Companies’. This is a great opportunity to up your skills and get interview-ready. Sign up now!
eventDeatureData.paragraph2_2: is hosting a FREE Masterclass on
eventDeatureData.paragraph3: Register today to reserve your spot.
eventDeatureData.paragraph24: Tips & tricks for nailing the hiring process at product-based companies
eventDeatureData.paragraph4: Expert advice on preparing for interviews
eventDeatureData.paragraph5: The ins & outs of transitioning from QA or Service to an SDE role
eventDeatureData.paragraph6: How Learnbay can give you the tools to reach your dream role in the tech world
eventDeatureData.para3: What you will gain from this Masterclass
eventDeatureData.paragraph6_5: Discover various location-based system design concepts.
eventDeatureData.paragraph7: Build the structures for applications and decide on the functional needs for modern Cab-booking services.
eventDeatureData.paragraph8: Learn the traffic estimation, database design, cache schema & architecture behind Cab booking apps
eventDeatureData.para5: Learn the Pre-requisites of this Masterclass for FREE
eventDeatureData.paragraph7_2: SDEs Wishing to convert to product companies from Service companies
eventDeatureData.paragraph8_3: SDEs wanting to learn System Design
eventDeatureData.para7: What our Learners have to say
eventDeatureData.paragraph14: Learnbay offers domain specialized courses in fields such as full-stack software development, Data Structure Algorithms and System Design
eventDeatureData.paragraph15: Are you an Engineer who’s not happy with the job and wants to upskill and get into MAANG companies? We are here with the best option, Learnbay’s software development and DSA system design courses are designed for the working professionals who wants to advance their career.
eventDeatureData.paragraph17: A curriculum that has been developed, supervised, and approved by industry experts
eventDeatureData.paragraph18: 1:1 mentorship, guided by top experts in the field
eventDeatureData.paragraph19: Gain technical expertise by working on challenging real- world projects
eventDeatureData.paragraph20: 250 + hiring partners with dedicated placement support and 100% Interview guaranteed
eventDeatureData.paragraph21: NEW! Attend a free Demo Class now and the enroll for the domain you’re looking for.
